news.content: Our lab has three papers accepted at NeurIPS 2025!
Our lab received support from Samsung Research to advance research in home robots. Thanks Samsung!
Our lab has three papers accepted at CoRL 2025. Congratulations, Nadun, Zhenyang, Yangcen, Woochul, Wonsuhk, and Utkarsh!
Our lab received support from NSF for research on active perception and planning. Thanks NSF!
Our lab received the NSF CAREER Award. Thanks NSF!
Danfei gave two talks at ICRA Workshops on Neural-Symbolic Data Engine.
Danfei gave a talk at the UMich Robotics Seminar on Generative Task and Motion Planning.
A case study covering our collaboration with Meta Reality Lab on Robot Learning from Human Data.
Received support from Autodesk for Research on Learning-based Automation.
Received support from Meta for Research on Robot Learning from Human data.
Danfei gave an Early Career Keynote at CoRL 2024 on Robot Learning from Embodied Human Data (slides)
Danfei gave a talk at the Cornell Robotics Seminar
Received NSF grant to develop generative models for robot training and validation
Hosting workshop on Data Generation for Robotics at RSS 2024
Danfei gave an invited talk at Toyota Research Institute
LEAGUE awarded IEEE RA-L Best Paper Honorable Mention (5/1200) and Open-X-Embodiment won Best Conference Paper at ICRA'24
Received support from Autodesk to work on high-precision robotic manipulation
MimicPlay awarded Best Paper and Best Systems Paper Finalist at CoRL 2023 (2/270)
Presenting 6 papers at CoRL 2023
Invited talk at CoRL 2023 (workshop link)
